pages.text: $(li)The Quick Charge enchantment can be applied in a $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the reload speed of this weapon.$(br)$(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.
pages.title: Quick Charge

pages.text: $(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_quick_charge)Ancient Tome (Quick Charge)$(/l).
